price: او لمونځ قائم کړئ او زکات ورکړئ او له رکوع کوونکو (لمونځ کوونکو) سره رکوع وکړئ.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرۡكَعُواْ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-ir'kaʿū maʿa al-rākiʿīna
